cards.title: A Fork in the Road
body: At the end of the environment turn, destroy a machination and this card.
When this card is destroyed, discard the top card of the environment deck. If that card is not a target, play the top card of the villain deck. Otherwise a player may play a card.
cards.flavorText: “Did you hope they'd kill me, or that she'd{BR}save me?” Burgess called after him.{BR}Without turning, Brother Stevens replied,{BR}“Hopes are for children, Detective.”

cards.title: Brother Mathis
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the target with the lowest HP {H - 2} infernal damage.
If an environment card is dealt damage this way, this card deals each non-environment target 2 infernal damage.
cards.flavorText: Brother Mathis' voice echoed throughout{BR}the chamber: “Forty daggers, seven lives,{BR}thirteen children, thirteen lies...”

cards.title: Business As Usual
body: At the end of the environment turn, 1 player may discard a card. If they do, select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2. If they do not, deal the non-environment target with the lowest hp 2 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: “What brings you to our humble meeting?” Mr.{BR}Konig asked. Burgess forced a smile. “Just{BR}looking for some glib denials regarding the{BR}body we just fished from the river.”

cards.title: Bystander
body: When this card is dealt damage, one player discards a card.
When this card reduced to 0 or fewer hp, each hero target deals itself 1 irreducible psychic damage. Then shuffle this card into the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: “Mom, I'll call you when I get back! Bastion{BR}is one of the safest cities in the country!”{BR}she said, hanging up the payphone. Sphere{BR}looked down from the rooftop, nodding.

cards.title: Clean Streets, Dirty Hands
body: At the end of the environment turn, discard the top {H - 1} cards of the environment deck. When a non-machination card is discarded this way with a keyword matching a card in play, put it into play.
cards.flavorText: Blitz growled. “Don't want nothin' but to{BR}make you see what a scam this city is! All{BR}them lights and purdy words is just to{BR}distract you while they pick your pockets!”

cards.title: Dark Tithe
body: At the start of the environment turn, discard the top {H - 2} cards of the environment deck. If {MrGoodman} is discarded this way, put him into play.
At the end of the environment turn, a player may discard a card. If a card is discarded this way, then 1 player may play a card.
cards.flavorText: A cold wind blew through Banshee as{BR}the money left her fingers. Power at any{BR}price was the Guild's motto. It was true{BR}more ways than one.

cards.title: Grim Sebastian
body: At the start of the environment turn, discard a card from under this card. This card deals the non-keeper card with the highest HP from that card's deck {H - 2} melee damage.
At the end of the environment turn, reveal and discard the top card of each deck. Put the revealed card with the most keywords under this card.
cards.flavorText: It was said his stern gaze could pierce all{BR}veils of truth or perception, given time.{BR}Ember hid just out of his view. She couldn't{BR}bear to think what he would see in her.

cards.title: Legitimate Businessmen
body: At the end of the environment turn, destroy a hero ongoing or equipment card.
Then this card deals the non-coalition target with the lowest hp 2 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: Mr. Brzezicki smiled thinly. “The thing you need{BR}to understand, Mr. Pryor... We keep things{BR}running smoothly at all costs. While those{BR}who work with us pay a nominal fee, I've heard{BR}that those who don't... Well, they pay even more.”

cards.title: Mr. Goodman
body: At the end of the environment turn, select a deck with no cards under this card. Put the top card of that deck under this card, then put the top card of that deck into play.
Then, this card deals each target from a deck with a card under this one 2 psychic damage each.
cards.flavorText: He'd needed the money badly, and hadn't{BR}realized how strange Goodman's smile{BR}was at the time. Now it waited for him in{BR}the dark whenever he closed his eyes.

cards.title: Playing Both Sides
body: When this card enters play, put the top card of each deck under it.
At the end of the environment turn, a player may discard 2 cards. If they do not, put the top card of the villain deck under this card.
At the start of the environment turn, put a random card from under this card into play. If a one-shot or environment card is played this way, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Liana sighed. “Come to gloat?” Brother{BR}Stevens' grey eye seemed to shimmer in the{BR}fluorescent light. “On the contrary, Ms.{BR}LeRoux, I am here to restore the balance.”

cards.title: Power Play
body: At the start of the environment turn, reveal the top {H} cards of the environment deck. Put any revealed machinations into play. Discard the other revealed cards. If a card enters play this way, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “I think I speak for everyone when I say that{BR}we should think... bigger,” Mr. Brzezicki said.{BR}Butcher Bill grinned. “You boys wanna take{BR}things up a notch? That's gonna cost extra.”

cards.title: Rites of the Black Thorn
body: Infernal damage is increased by 1 and irreducible.
The first time each turn any target is destroyed by infernal damage, play the top card of the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: Brother LeRoux smiled as he inspected the{BR}tattoo. “Excellent work, Initiate Ellington.{BR}Your talent will not go overlooked. I see{BR}you going far in the Academy.”

cards.title: The Spider's Web
body: At the start of the environment turn, destroy a machination other than this card. If you do not, destroy this card.
At the end of the environment turn, increase the next damage dealt by the villain target with the highest HP by 2.
cards.flavorText: “Zsejke Bogozi. She doesn't like to get{BR}her hands dirty, but you follow any{BR}criminal operation in the city far enough,{BR}you'll always find her name.”

cards.title: Two Sides to Shadows
body: Reduce damage dealt to keepers and civilians by 1.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy an ongoing card. Then play the top card of that card's deck.
cards.flavorText: The figure's muffled voice returned steadily{BR}through the mask. “No joy without sorrow.{BR}No power without pain. No end without a{BR}beginning. And no beginning without an end.”
